member.name: T:XLabs.Caching.SQLite.SQLiteSimpleCache
member.summary: Implements and caching interfaces using SQLite.Async.Pcl library.

member.name: M:XLabs.Caching.SQLite.SQLiteSimpleCache.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the specified item from the cache.
member.param: The identifier for the item to delete.
member.returns: True if the item was successfully removed from the cache; false otherwise.

member.name: M:XLabs.Caching.SQLite.SQLiteSimpleCache.RemoveAll(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Removes the cache for all the keys provided.
member.param: The keys to remove.

member.name: M:XLabs.Caching.SQLite.SQLiteSimpleCache.Get``1(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the specified item from the cache.
member.param: The identifier for the item to retrieve.
member.returns: The retrieved item, or null if the key was not found.

member.name: M:XLabs.Caching.SQLite.SQLiteSimpleCache.Add``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Adds a new item into the cache at the specified cache key only if the cache is empty.
member.param: The key used to reference the item.
The object to be inserted into the cache.
member.returns: True if item was added, otherwise false.
member.remarks: The item does not expire unless it is removed due memory pressure.

member.name: M:XLabs.Caching.SQLite.SQLiteSimpleCache.Set``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Sets an item into the cache at the cache key specified regardless if it already exists or not.
member.param: Key for the item.
Item to set.
member.returns: True if item was added, otherwise false.

member.name: M:XLabs.Caching.SQLite.SQLiteSimpleCache.Replace``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Replaces the item at the cache.
member.param: Key for the item to replace.
Item to replace with.
member.returns: True if the item exists, otherwise false.

member.name: M:XLabs.Caching.SQLite.SQLiteSimpleCache.FlushAll
member.summary: Invalidates all data on the cache.

member.name: M:XLabs.Caching.SQLite.SQLiteSimpleCache.GetAll``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Retrieves multiple items from the cache. The default value of T is set for all keys that do not exist.
member.param: The list of identifiers for the items to retrieve.
member.returns: a Dictionary holding all items indexed by their key.

member.name: M:XLabs.Caching.SQLite.SQLiteSimpleCache.SetAll``1(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,``0})
member.summary: Sets multiple items to the cache.
member.param: The values.

member.name: M:XLabs.Caching.SQLite.SQLiteSimpleCache.RemoveAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the specified item from the cache.
member.param: The identifier for the item to delete.
member.returns: True if the item was successfully removed from the cache; false otherwise.

member.name: M:XLabs.Caching.SQLite.SQLiteSimpleCache.RemoveAllAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Removes the cache for all the keys provided.
member.param: The keys to remove.

member.name: M:XLabs.Caching.SQLite.SQLiteSimpleCache.GetAsync``1(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the specified item from the cache.
member.param: The identifier for the item to retrieve.
member.returns: The retrieved item, or null if the key was not found.

The object to be inserted into the cache.
member.returns: True if item was added, otherwise false.
